short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steam Achievement Guide Extension shows guides on game pages, including difficulty, time, missables, and direct guide links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steam Achievement Guide Extension

This extension enhances your Steam experience by displaying detailed achievement guides directly on Steam game pages, offering insights such as difficulty, number of playthroughs, time to complete, and missable achievements. It also provides direct links to comprehensive guides to help you master your favorite games.

Free Features
* View achievement guide details on Steam game pages, including difficulty, playthroughs, time, and more.
* Access guide details for up to 20 games on your wishlist.

Exclusive Features for Subscribers
* Hover Access: Instantly view achievement guides by hovering over game titles.
* Unlimited Wishlist Guides: Unlock unlimited guide views for all games on your wishlist.
* Special Discord Role: Stand out in the community with an exclusive role on our Discord server.
